main event: A ground visual observation of a round silver object suspected to be a balloon occurred on 31 October 1957 in Kanopolis, Kansas.
interesting points: The object was moving very slowly and low, with a trajectory moving southeast., The sighting lasted for 30 seconds., The report concludes that the object was probably a balloon., The observer was a civilian housewife from Kanopolis, Kansas., Two F-8E fighters were vectored to the area but did not see the object.
